name: OleCoin
description: Olecoin is a BEP 20 token leading the launching of the first Brazilian platform to tokenize soccer players future receives. New talents could create their profiles, we use real scouts to validate their informations and once it is approved we create their tokens promoting to our community and with investors. Tokens could be NFT, DeFi or ERC-20. We use the right technology according to the commercial contract signed with the new talent. Our range of business include good connections with the biggest clubs in the world. Olecoin has full potential to be one of the best sports blockchain projects
